hero.resume: Eu sou um engenheiro de software backend especializado em construir aplicações na nuvem de alta qualidade, escalaveis e seguras.

aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.content_p1: Hi! I'm Vand and I create tech solutions to solve problems. I always have liked technology since my childhood, at first, I wanted to be a game developer but I was delighted with the experience of solving real problems and impacting people's lives.
aboutme.content_p2: My interest started back in 2014 when I built a small game using RPG Maker and after I create a blog on WordPress, those experiences taught me a lot about web development, and since then working with technology became a dream. The next year I was at the Brazil Game Show showing the result of my job to thousands of people per day, and this experience really changed the way I see how my job affects other people and this bring to me a strong sense of responsibility with my solutions.
aboutme.content_p3: My main focus these days is building reliable solutions that can cause a good experience for clients.

zup.content_p1: Inovating in bank technologic with {{- links.itau}} to make people's financial lives easier through the digital bank
zup.content_p2: I participated in the implementation of the instant transfer method (PIX), in the sharing of information between financial institutions through Open Banking and currently working as a data engineer contributing to building a digital identity of our clients.

brisa.content_p1: Working in a R&D environment I was able to contribute to {{- links.vivo}}'s and {{- links.claro}}'s management system of business mobile plans.

2018.content: I contributed with {{- links.caixa}} to create the mobile app {{- links.caixahabitacao}} to make easier for the families manager your residential financing aggrement.

2015.content: I participated in the construction of AGHU, a hospital management software used by all university hospitals in Brazil.

contact.title: Say a hello
contact.content: I'm always open to exploring new opportunities, so feel free to reach out if you have something in mind. Additionally, if you just want to connect or have a question, don't hesitate to message me. I'll do my best to get back to you as soon as possible.
